author: costin
msg: One more step ( it took far longer than I expected, but I think we're close now ).
Removed all dependencis between JspServlet and jasper, hidden behind abstract
That allows JspServlet to be included in runtime, and loaded without requiring
jasper or jaxp or any other jasper dependency in the class loader. JspServlet will
use it's own class loader to load jasper and compile the servlet ( XXX needs testing -
this is just the initial refactoring to support that ).
The Servlet-based container liaison and the servlet wrapper are now part of
